name: Pressable, Inc.
description: Provider of WordPress hosting services designed to make WordPress hosting easy, fast and reliable at scale. The company's WordPress hosting services provides automatic update, traffic scaling, nightly backups and responsive support enabling companies to share branded content and deliver engaging online shopping experiences to its users.
